oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement from Nashville City Directory, 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page of advertisement from the 1871 Nashville City Directory featuring Stewart & Geiger, machinists and blacksmiths, at no. 41, South College Street (3rd Avenue) in downtown Nashville. Also an advertisement for A. Rannie, wholesale confectioner and baker, and “dealer in can fruits, oysters, nuts, etc., crackers by the barrel or box,” located at no. 24 Broad Street and J.L. Atkins, Agent, horse-shoers and horse-men, located at 118 N. Cherry Street. Forms part of Nashville City Directory Collection, Metro Archives. 1 digital image.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stewart & Geiger (Nashville, Tenn.); J.L. Atkins (Nashville, Tenn.); A. Rannie (Nashville, Tenn.)
